title: ID冲突了怎么办
author: mxdorbnb
txt_content: 下了个中世纪村庄MOD，可是放进去就提示a list of ID conflicts has been written to the file 'IDConflicts.txt' in your minecraft directory，知道是ID冲突，可是就是找不到IDConflicts.txt'，到底这个文件在哪啊，搜索也搜索不到，好像村庄MOD也没创建CONFIG里面的配置

replies.author: mxdorbnb
replies.txt_content:
l519795122 发表于 2014-11-7 20:21
你可以试一下IDFIXMODhttp://www.mcmod.cn/s?key=idfix
谢谢，不过好像找不到下载地址噢

replies.author: mxdorbnb
replies.txt_content:
l519795122 发表于 2014-11-7 20:21
你可以试一下IDFIXMODhttp://www.mcmod.cn/s?key=idfix
哦，突然又找到了，谢谢你啊
